abstract: Fifteen first-time advertisers are spending big bucks for commercials during Super Bowl, most newcomers since 2000; analysts attribute large number of first-time advertisers, in part, to fact that ad space did not sell out until later than usual, and note that number of first-timers has been steadily increasing year after year.
lead_paragraph: A tiny start-up in Silicon Valley is one of 15 first-time advertisers that will compete for attention on Sunday against the usual lineup of deep-pocketed brands.
snippet: A tiny start-up in Silicon Valley is one of 15 first-time advertisers that will compete for attention on Sunday against the usual lineup of deep-pocketed brands.

headline.main: Newcomers Buy Ad Time at the Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Newcomers Buy Ad Time at Big Game
